Description:
Conduct medical consultations related to the gamut of services offered at the clinic towards their respective medical or aesthetic conditions.
Execute and supervise advanced skin cosmetic procedures at the clinic.
Cosmetic procedures were botulinum toxin (such as botox) injections, hyaluronic acid treatments, laser hair removal, nonsurgical fat reduction, and photorejuvenation (IPL).Skills
Skills:
5+ years of experience as a Dermatologist and cosmetologist
Only Physician License holders apply. (Assistant physician is not applicable as per QCHP guidelines)
Should have post-qualification experience in government/semi-government hospitals or private teaching hospitals.

Medical Degree with appropriate board qualification (see licensing below)
Experience in the ambulatory surgical and outpatient setting.
Valid Primary License from the country of origin if applicable AND should be eligible for-
Consultants license in the Qatar with QCHP.
Should be ready to relocate to Qatar.
